divs: sighting detailsi was watching the weather channel on the evening of all the tornadoes. they featured one live that they said at least a mile wide. there were sky scrapers in the foreground. after tornado had dissipated i could see an oblong circle on the right side of the picture. it was just in the cloud formation but very visible and stationary. i did not capture an image. i couldn't believe no one noticed or said something about it. coverage then changed. i thought i'd find some discussion about it in some forums i participate in. i have not seen anything to date but there it was and it appeared to be big as in 200 ft diameter or so. hopefully they saved the footage of this historic monster tornado. *(wit's first name deleted--cms\sg).
Summary: Oblong Circular (side) UFO on weather channel after major tornado
